p: In other studies, the oils of Eucalyptus torquata stems exhibited cytotoxic activities on MCF-7 cells [ 27]. Huang et al. [ 28] have investigated the effect of two volatile oils prepared by steam distillation (SD) and supercritical fluid extraction (SFE) of Centipeda minima, a Chinese herb used in the treatment of various diseases including cancer. They found that SFE oil displayed potent anti-angiogenic activity in a zebrafish model [ 28].
